content.text: One of Jorge's Father's favorite dishes from Mexico was chilaquiles. He wrote down the recipe to try to make it at home. This is what he wrote, please read it.
content.name: tLLp

content.class: bg-slate-100 rounded p-3 my-2 max-w-5xl mx-auto

content.text: Ingredients: A lot of tortillas, some sour cream, a little cheese, enough onion, and lots of chicken.
content.name: X6gl

content.text: Ingredients for the salsa: a little garlic, some onion, very few chilli peppers, salt, a cup of water, some cilantro.
content.name: cp42

content.text: Preparation: First you let the tortillas dry up, then you'll cut them in little triangles to fry them in oil, just be carefull not to let them fry a lot.Then, to make the salsa, just put all the ingredients in the blender. Next, put the chicken in some water with some garlic and onion and let it boil. Once cooked, you shred it. Subsequently, place all the tortilla triangles in a pan, and pour the salsa on them, and mix it while the pan warms . Once the salsa is hot along with the tortilla, serve a portion on a plate. Finally, pour as much sour cream as you want, as well as the shreded chicken, put a litlle bit of onion and it will be ready to eat.
